@@ -3264,1 +3264,0 @@
-#ifdef ASSERT
@@ -3266,2 +3265,2 @@
-  assert(init_n->get_int() + cl->stride_con() >= cl->limit()->get_int(), "should be one iteration");

+         (cl->stride_con() < 0 && init_n->get_int() + cl->stride_con() <= cl->limit()->get_int()), "should be one iteration");
